SELECT STD_SN as stdSn --표준일정일련번호 , STD_TITL as stdTitl --표준일정명 , WBS_SCN_CD as wbsScnCd --WBS구분코드 , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('WBS_type',WBS_SCN_CD) wbsScnNm --WBS구분명 , LAST_MDFY_DT as lastRgstDt , dbo.fn_getUserName(LAST_MDFY_ID) as lastRgstNm
FROM IRIS_WBS_STD_MGMT
WHERE 1=1
AND STD_TITL like '%${stdTitl}%'
AND WBS_SCN_CD = '${wbsScnCd}'

/*retrieveWbsStdList*/ SELECT STD_SN as stdSn --표준일정일련번호 , WBS_SN as wbsSn --WBS일련번호 , PID_SN as pidSn --PID , DEPTH as depth --DEPTH , DEPTH_SEQ as depthSeq --순서 , WBS_NM as wbsNm --WBS명 , STRT_DT as strtDt --시작일 , FNH_DT as fnhDt --종료일 , ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId --첨부파일 , isnull(WGVL,0) as wgvl --가중치 , '0' as trm -- 기간 FROM IRIS_WBS_STD_DTL_LIST
WHERE STD_SN = '${stdSn}'
